to be happy, to have joy.

2833.text:
"Well, why do people suffer
if we all have angels?

2836.text:
Why do people suffer?
Why do bad things happen?"

2839.text:
We all have free will
and we all have a choice.

2845.text:
We can choose to be angry
or we can choose to be at peace.

2849.text:
None of us are alone,
and if we really knew

2852.text:
who stood beside us and
behind us and in front of us,

2857.text:
We'd never be afraid
to go after our dreams

2860.text:
and live our best life
and take that chance

2865.text:
We wouldn't be afraid
that we didn't have money

2868.text:
to do the things
that we wanted to do.

2869.text:
We wouldn't be afraid
to do anything.

2873.text:
and we would walk
with blind faith,

2875.text:
just knowing that everything
was always gonna work out

2878.text:
- As my friend
and spiritual teacher

2880.text: who passed away would say to me,

2883.text:
"Every moment, every breath,
is a moment of creation."

2888.text:
Some people get so s--
caught in the process of,

2892.text:
"Oh, I want this, and I want
this, and I want this,"

2895.text:
and then it doesn't show up
immediately,

2898.text:
so then they're like,
"Well that's not gonna happen."

2905.text:
Now you've got five minutes
of moving toward it

2908.text:
and all of a sudden, "Oh, well,
it's not going to happen."

2916.text:
So--and I mean, I tell--
I tell my clients that as well

2920.text:
that come here, you know,
I can predict

2923.text: but I can't make it happen.

2926.text:
So when you come to me
for a reading,

2928.text:
I give you a snapshot
of what I see as possibility.

2932.text:
It's up to the client
to create it.

2936.text:
Have you ever had a day
that just started out

2940.text: to be the absolute worst day,

2942.text:
and you were
in the absolute worst mood,

2944.text:
and it just progressed
through the entire day?

2948.text:
That's because your energy's
progressing negativity.

2954.text:
If you can stop, take a breath,
refresh, and refocus...

2960.text:
I tell people,
"Turn on your GPS.

2964.text:
"When you get up in the morning,
when your feet hit the floor,

2967.text:
you state what you want
your day to be."

2975.text:
and what you see
and what you know,

2977.text:
and if you're doing
something good and trying to be,

2980.text:
you know, trying to be good
and beneficial to the world,

2983.text:
then the things people say
are not--

2986.text:
they're not real.
They don't matter.

2988.text:
So that's what I--that's what
I usually say, you know.

2992.text:
Just believe in what you have
as your own intuition.

2996.text:
- There are only two ways,
fear and love, nothing else.

3000.text:
The rest doesn't exist,
and fear is false.

3004.text:
We use it,
"False evidence appearing real."

3010.text:
False evidence
appearing to be real.

3013.text:
that's what fear is.
It's not real.
